BitField.name: OPTVERR
BitField.description: Option and Engineering bits loading validity error

BitField.name: SYSF_ECC
BitField.description: ECC fail for Corrected ECC Error or Double ECC Error in info block

BitField.name: BORF_LEV
BitField.description: These bits contain the VDD supply level threshold that activates the reset

BitField.name: BORR_LEV
BitField.description: These bits contain the VDD supply level threshold that releases the reset.

BitField.name: IWDG_STOP
BitField.description: Independent watchdog counter freeze in Stop mode

BitField.name: IWDG_STDBY
BitField.description: Independent watchdog counter freeze in Standby mode

Register.description: Flash PCROP zone A End address register

BitField.description: PCROP area preserved when RDP level decreased

Register.description: Flash WRP area B address register

Register.description: Flash PCROP zone B Start address register

Register.name: PCROP1BER
Register.description: Flash PCROP zone B End address register

BitField.name: BOOT_LOCK
BitField.description: used to force boot from user area

BitField.name: HSIKERON
BitField.description: HSI16 always enable for peripheral kernels

BitField.name: PLLM
BitField.description: Division factor M of the PLL input clock divider

BitField.name: PLLP

BitField.description: PLL VCO division factor R for PLLRCLK clock output

BitField.description: LSE Clock security system interrupt clear

BitField.description: SYSCFG, COMP and VREFBUF clock enable

Register.name: C0CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request line multiplexer channel x control register

BitField.name: SOIE
BitField.description: Interrupt enable at synchronization event overrun

BitField.name: SPOL
BitField.description: Synchronization event type selector Defines the synchronization event on the selected synchronization input:

BitField.name: NBREQ
BitField.description: Number of DMA requests to forward Defines the number of DMA requests forwarded before output event is generated. In synchronous mode, it also defines the number of DMA requests to forward after a synchronization event, then stop forwarding. The actual number of DMA requests forwarded is NBREQ+1. Note: This field can only be written when both SE and EGE bits are reset.

Register.name: C1CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request line multiplexer channel x control register

Register.name: RG0CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator channel x control register

BitField.name: OIE
BitField.description: Interrupt enable at trigger event overrun

BitField.name: GPOL
BitField.description: DMA request generator trigger event type selection Defines the trigger event on the selected DMA request trigger input

BitField.name: GNBREQ
BitField.description: Number of DMA requests to generate Defines the number of DMA requests generated after a trigger event, then stop generating. The actual number of generated DMA requests is GNBREQ+1. Note: This field can only be written when GE bit is reset.

Register.name: RG1CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator channel x control register

BitField.name: OIE
BitField.description: Interrupt enable at trigger event overrun

BitField.name: GPOL
BitField.description: DMA request generator trigger event type selection Defines the trigger event on the selected DMA request trigger input

BitField.name: GNBREQ
BitField.description: Number of DMA requests to generate Defines the number of DMA requests generated after a trigger event, then stop generating. The actual number of generated DMA requests is GNBREQ+1. Note: This field can only be written when GE bit is reset.

Register.name: RG2CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator channel x control register

BitField.name: OIE
BitField.description: Interrupt enable at trigger event overrun

BitField.name: GPOL
BitField.description: DMA request generator trigger event type selection Defines the trigger event on the selected DMA request trigger input

BitField.name: GNBREQ
BitField.description: Number of DMA requests to generate Defines the number of DMA requests generated after a trigger event, then stop generating. The actual number of generated DMA requests is GNBREQ+1. Note: This field can only be written when GE bit is reset.

Register.name: RG3CR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator channel x control register

BitField.name: OIE
BitField.description: Interrupt enable at trigger event overrun

BitField.name: GPOL
BitField.description: DMA request generator trigger event type selection Defines the trigger event on the selected DMA request trigger input

BitField.name: GNBREQ
BitField.description: Number of DMA requests to generate Defines the number of DMA requests generated after a trigger event, then stop generating. The actual number of generated DMA requests is GNBREQ+1. Note: This field can only be written when GE bit is reset.

Register.name: RGSR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator status register

BitField.name: OF
BitField.description: Trigger event overrun flag The flag is set when a trigger event occurs on DMA request generator channel x, while the DMA request generator counter value is lower than GNBREQ. The flag is cleared by writing 1 to the corresponding COFx bit in DMAMUX_RGCFR register.

Register.name: RGCFR
Register.description: DMAMux - DMA request generator clear flag register

BitField.name: COF
BitField.description: Clear trigger event overrun flag Upon setting, this bit clears the corresponding overrun flag OFx in the DMAMUX_RGCSR register.

BitField.description: When the DSI_NSS bit is set, the NSS pin input will be ignored

BitField.description: Transmission complete before guard time flag

BitField.name: WUCF
BitField.description: Wakeup from Stop mode clear flag

BitField.name: TCBGTCF
BitField.description: Transmission complete before Guard time clear flag

BitField.name: RXNEIE
BitField.description: RX buffer not empty interrupt enable

BitField.name: CHLEN
BitField.description: Channel length (number of bits per audio channel)

BitField.name: RXNEIE
BitField.description: RX buffer not empty interrupt enable

BitField.name: CHLEN
BitField.description: Channel length (number of bits per audio channel)

BitField.name: EOS
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of sequence conversions flag

BitField.name: EOC
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of unitary conversion flag

BitField.name: EOSMP
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of sampling flag

BitField.name: EOSIE
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of sequence conversions interrupt

BitField.name: EOCIE
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of unitary conversion interrupt

BitField.name: EOSMPIE
BitField.description: ADC group regular end of sampling interrupt

BitField.name: AWDCH1CH
BitField.description: ADC analog watchdog 1 monitored channel selection

BitField.name: AWD1EN
BitField.description: ADC analog watchdog 1 enable on scope ADC group regular

BitField.name: AWD1SGL
BitField.description: ADC analog watchdog 1 monitoring a single channel or all channels

BitField.name: CHSELRMOD
BitField.description: Mode selection of the ADC_CHSELR register

BitField.name: DISCEN
BitField.description: ADC group regular sequencer discontinuous mode

BitField.name: CONT
BitField.description: ADC group regular continuous conversion mode

BitField.name: EXTEN
BitField.description: ADC group regular external trigger polarity

BitField.name: EXTSEL
BitField.description: ADC group regular external trigger source

BitField.name: TOVS
BitField.description: ADC oversampling discontinuous mode (triggered mode) for ADC group regular

BitField.name: OVSE
BitField.description: ADC oversampler enable on scope ADC group regular

Register.name: CHSELR_1
Register.description: channel selection register CHSELRMOD = 1 in ADC_CFGR1

Register.name: DR
Register.description: ADC group regular conversion data register

BitField.name: AWD2CH
BitField.description: ADC analog watchdog 2 monitored channel selection

BitField.name: AWD3CH
BitField.description: ADC analog watchdog 3 monitored channel selection

BitField.name: CALFACT
BitField.description: ADC calibration factor in single-ended mode

BitField.name: I2C_PAx_FMP
BitField.description: Fast Mode Plus (FM+) driving capability activation bits

BitField.name: I2C2_FMP
BitField.description: FM+ driving capability activation for I2C2

BitField.name: I2C1_FMP
BitField.description: FM+ driving capability activation for I2C1

BitField.name: I2C_PBx_FMP
BitField.description: Fast Mode Plus (FM+) driving capability activation bits

BitField.name: BOOSTEN
BitField.description: I/O analog switch voltage booster enable

BitField.name: HEAD10R
BitField.description: 10-bit address header only read direction (master receiver mode)

BitField.name: HEAD10R
BitField.description: 10-bit address header only read direction (master receiver mode)

BitField.name: CALP
BitField.description: Increase frequency of RTC by 488.5 ppm

BitField.name: SUBFS
BitField.description: Subtract a fraction of a second

BitField.name: DU
BitField.description: Date units or day in BCD format

BitField.name: MASKSS
BitField.description: Mask the most-significant bits starting at this bit

BitField.name: DU
BitField.description: Date units or day in BCD format

BitField.name: MASKSS
BitField.description: Mask the most-significant bits starting at this bit

BitField.name: HFNMIENA
BitField.description: Enables the operation of MPU during hard fault

BitField.name: PRIVDEFENA
BitField.description: Enable priviliged software access to default memory map

Register.name: MPU_RASR
Register.description: MPU region attribute and size register

BitField.name: SIZE
BitField.description: Size of the MPU protection region

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: SKEW flag: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application interrupt and reset control register

BitField.name: NONBASETHRDENA
BitField.description: Configures how the processor enters Thread mode

BitField.name: ENVR
BitField.description: Voltage reference buffer mode enable This bit is used to enable the voltage reference buffer mode.

BitField.name: HIZ
BitField.description: High impedance mode This bit controls the analog switch to connect or not the VREF+ pin. Refer to Table196: VREF buffer modes for the mode descriptions depending on ENVR bit configuration.

BitField.name: VRS
BitField.description: Voltage reference scale These bits select the value generated by the voltage reference buffer. Other: Reserved

BitField.name: TRIM
BitField.description: Trimming code These bits are automatically initialized after reset with the trimming value stored in the Flash memory during the production test. Writing into these bits allows to tune the internal reference buffer voltage.

BitField.name: DBG_TIM2_STOP
BitField.description: TIM2 counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_TIM3_STOP
BitField.description: TIM3 counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_RTC_STOP
BitField.description: RTC counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_WWDG_STOP
BitField.description: Window watchdog counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_IWDG_STOP
BitField.description: Independent watchdog counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_I2C1_STOP
BitField.description: I2C1 SMBUS timeout counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_TIM1_STOP
BitField.description: TIM1 counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DZC
BitField.description: Division by zero cumulative exception bit.

BitField.name: PVDOUT
BitField.description: PVD supply monitoring interrupt request pending (EXTI line 16).

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor
